column4: hello fellow Ubuntu'ers... I have a serious problem... I've found a PS2 in my house with a network card and hard drive interface... but Sony no longer sells Linux Kits for PS2... has anyone been successful installing Ubuntu, or any other distro on PS2 without the actual Sony software?
D7k... I would... but I have 2 PS2s... and well, this one is kinda worthless if it's not a PC...
The sequence is "post the link, then read to see what it is".  I was up to step two when you pointed out my folly.  :o)
